course_description: Topics may include nature and role of experience in developing knowledge and improving practice, consideration of theories of truth, relationship between values and lived experience, the role of criticism in creating improved practices: politics, education, social life.
sections: Class Nbr: 4921, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MWF 4-4:50p, Instructor: D. Westbrook, Status: Open
